modName: Female Animations for Housecarls and Mjoll.
summary: Lydia, Mjoll, etc. use male animations (which look weird when you use custom animations), so this is a simple plugin that reverts that.
descriptionHtml:
Lydia, Mjoll, etc. use male animations (which look weird when you use custom animations), so this is a simple plugin that reverts that.Â If you have any other NPC who you'd like to have changed in a similar fashion, PM me and I'll see what I can do. I recommend rebashing your bashed patch so that you can use this mod alongside other NPC editors (e.g.: Bijin Mods)

Installation: Open the archive and drop the plugin into the Data file.

Requirements: Skyrim (duh)

Recommended: Bashed Patch (to use alongside other NPC editors)
author: Tath
